  • Classes in languageTools.program.agent.actions used by goal.core.agent 
    Class and Description
    UserSpecAction
    A user-specified action of the form 'name(parameters)' with one or more associated action specifications (i.e., precondition, postcondition pairs).
  • Classes in languageTools.program.agent.actions used by languageTools.program.agent 
    Class and Description
    UserSpecAction
    A user-specified action of the form 'name(parameters)' with one or more associated action specifications (i.e., precondition, postcondition pairs).
  • Classes in languageTools.program.agent.actions used by languageTools.program.agent.actions 
    Class and Description
    Action
    Abstract class for the actions that a GOAL agent can perform.
    ActionCombo
    An ActionCombo is a list of actions that have been combined by the + operator in a Rule of an agent program.
    AdoptAction
    Adopts a goal by adding it to the GoalBase.
    AdoptOneAction
    Adopts a goal by adding it into the GoalBase.
    DeleteAction
    Deletes an Update from the BeliefBase base and/or mail box.
    DropAction
    Drops all goals entailed by the goal to be dropped from the GoalBase.
    ExitModuleAction
    Forces an exit from the current (non-anonymous) Module.
    ExitModuleAction.ExitTarget 
    InsertAction
    Inserts an Update into the agent's BeliefBase and/or mail box.
    LogAction
    Exports the mental state to a file.
    MentalAction
    Parent class for all actions that *only* modify the MentalState of an agent and do *not* have external side effects outside the multi-agent system itself.
    ModuleCallAction
    Action that makes the agent focus on a module, using one of four methods; When the action is executed, and the agent focuses on the module, the new attention set will consist of one goal, which validates the entire context of the Module.
    To use this method, focus on a Module with the Module.FocusMethod.SELECT focus method.

    Note that this method has better performance, as no new databases need to be created due to the context.
    PrintAction
    Prints its argument to Sytem.out.
    SendAction
    Sends a message to one or more Agents.
    SendOnceAction
    The SendOnceAction is a special kind of send action that requires that the message to be sent has not been sent before yet (to the intended recipients).
    UserSpecAction
    A user-specified action of the form 'name(parameters)' with one or more associated action specifications (i.e., precondition, postcondition pairs).
    UserSpecAction.PrePost
    Represents a precondition,postcondition pair as specified in the action specification section of the GOAL agent.
    UserSpecOrModuleCall
    Action used for parsing purposes only.
  • Classes in languageTools.program.agent.actions used by languageTools.program.agent.rules
